core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Blend artisanal warmth with digital precision
Emotion First: Every pixel conveys 'handmade luxury'
Content is King: The crochet pieces are the heroes; UI recedes
Negative Space: Generous breathing room (2x-3x standard)
Contrast: Delicate gold details against deep blue text

typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for all major headings. Use Manrope for product descriptions and UI elements. Use Cormorant Garamond for italicized quotes or 'handmade with love' badges.

primary.description: Clean white background, deep slate text

secondary.description: Soft slate grey for secondary backgrounds

brand.description: Deep Royal Blue (Azul) - Elegant and trustworthy

accent.description: Metallic Gold (Dourado) - For buttons, highlights, and borders

usage_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Deep Slate (#0F172A).
Use Gold sparingly for 'Call to Action' and delicate borders.
Backgrounds should be mostly White (#FFFFFF) or very subtle Off-White (#F8FAFC).
Text on Blue backgrounds must be White.
Hover states for Gold buttons should darken slightly.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A: The Tetris Grid)
strategies: Mobile-First: Start with single column, expand to 8/12 cols on desktop.
Asymmetry: Use different span sizes for product images to create visual interest.
Breathing Room: Add extra padding inside product cards.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-white hover:bg-[#B4941F] rounded-none px-8 py-3 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-[#1e3a8a] text-[#1e3a8a] hover:bg-[#1e3a8a] hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-3 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.whatsapp: bg-[#25D366] text-white hover:bg-[#128C7E] rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex items-center gap-2 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 border border-slate-100
cards.feature: p-8 border border-slate-100 bg-slate-50 hover:bg-white transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: border-b border-slate-300 bg-transparent px-0 py-2 focus:border-[#1e3a8a] focus:ring-0 rounded-none placeholder:text-slate-400

guidelines: Images should scale gently (scale-105) on hover.

hero.alt: Woman in elegant dress at sunset
hero.description: Atmospheric hero image conveying freedom and elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use Shadcn UI for the Admin Panel components (Table, Dialog, Form, Input).
Use Custom HTML/Tailwind for the Marketing/Catalog pages to ensure uniqueness.
Implement the 'WhatsApp Order' logic: Create a link `https://wa.me/PHONE?text=I'm interested in {product} size {size} color {color}`.
For the Color Selector: Use circular swatches with tooltips.
For the Admin: Use a clean Dashboard layout with a sidebar.
Ensure Mobile Responsiveness: The Catalog grid must collapse to 1 column on mobile.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Use 'data-testid' for all buttons and inputs.
